title: Textile, late 18th–early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain compound satin
dimensions:
a) Warp x Weft: 59.3 x 20 cm (23 3/8 x 7 7/8 in.)
b) Warp x Weft: 18.5 x 19.8 cm (7 5/16 x 7 13/16 in.)
description: Two fragments of border pattern of baroque foliage forms with birds and insects perched on the branches or hovering about them. Pattern in extra wefts of white on green satin ground.
